extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Uhm...\. Hello, Lea.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Hum...\. Bonjour, Lea.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: So...\. they released the new Beach area today, didn't they?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Donc...\. ils ont sorti la nouvelle zone de plage aujourd'hui, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I heard getting the shallow water to work was quite tricky actually.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'ai entendu que c'était difficile, en fait, de faire fonctionner les eaux peu profondes.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hope it was worth the effort.\. You should definitely check it out.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'espère que ça méritait bien l'effort.\. En tout cas tu devrais aller jeter un coup d'œil.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Anyway...\. I still have things to do here.\. Right now...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: En tout cas...\. J'ai encore des choses à faire en ce moment,\. là...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Uhm...\. Hello, Lea.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Hum...\. Bonjour, Lea.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: So, do you like it here in Homestedt?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Donc, ça te plait d'être ici, à \v[area.evo-village.name] ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Yeah, they certainly went the extra mile, constructing a whole village just for us.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui, ils ont vraiment pas lésiné, pour construire un village entier rien que pour nous.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Uhm...\. now if you'll excuse me...\. I was just in the middle of coding a complicated segment...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Hum...\. Mais si tu pouvais m'excuser...\. J'étais en train de coder une section compliquée...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Uhm...\. Hello, Lea.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Hum...\. Bonjour, Lea.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Running that dungeon was quite the marathon, wasn't it?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Courir ce donjon était vraiment un marathon, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And now everyone at Instatainment is busy working on that extension.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et maintenant tout le monde chez Instatainment est occupé à travailler sur cette extension.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Including myself.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Y compris moi-même.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I have a couple neat ideas on how to get Evotars like us involved in entirely new ways.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'ai quelques bonnes idées sur comment impliquer des Évotars comme nous de manière originale.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: How?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Comment ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Uhm...\. sorry, but I can't really share too much at the moment.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Hum...\. désolé, mais je ne peux pas en dire trop pour l'instant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let's just say that our future prospects might be quite...\. exciting.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Disons juste que notre futur risque d'être...\. assez réjouissant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Satoshi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Satoshi !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: ...\. Sister...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: ...\. Petite sœur...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: What are you doing?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Qu'est-ce que tu fabriques ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Working.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je travaille.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Can't there be a time in your life when you're NOT doing that?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu peux pas avoir un moment dans ta vie où tu fais AUTRE CHOSE ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: It's part of the agreement.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ça fait partie de l'accord.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Yes, yes!\. There's always an agreement!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui, oui !\. Il y a toujours un accord !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: It's a big reason why Instatainment supports us.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est la raison principale pour lequel Instatainment nous soutient vraiment.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: They wanted me back...\. so I can work for them.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ils voulaient que je revienne...\. pour que je travaille pour eux.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Seriously though...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Non mais sérieusement...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Constantly working like that can't be good for you...\. even being an Evotar.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Être constamment en train de bosser comme ça, ça peut pas être bon pour toi...\. Même en étant un Évotar.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You know...\. I'm honestly feeling much more resilient this way.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu sais...\. Je me sens vraiment plus résistant comme ça.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Of course you'd say that.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'étais sûre que tu dirais ça.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: No really!\. I feel great!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Non, vraiment !\. Je me sens bien !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oh...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oh...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You just fell over.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu viens de tomber.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Yeah, this happens sometimes.\. It's no big deal.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui, ça arrive parfois.\. C'est pas grave.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: See?\. All good.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu vois ?\. tout va bien.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Alright, that does it!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bon, ça suffit !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You, sir, are going to get some fresh air!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Vous, monsieur, aller devoir prendre un peu d'air frais !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You know about the new area they just released, right?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu es au courant de la nouvelle zone qui vient de sortir, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Of course I do.\. I'm involved in development.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bien sur.\. Je participe au développement.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Seems like a lovely place.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: L'endroit semble être assez joli.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You actually never went there, did you?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu n'y as jamais mis les pieds, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: No...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Non...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Alright then, let's go there together!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bon, alors on y va tous les deux !
Mais...\.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Right now!\. Let's take a break and visit those islands.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tout de suite !\. Faisons une pause et allons visiter ces îles.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: But I'm busy...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais je suis occupé...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: No buts!\. I checked with Sergey and the others.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pas de mais !\. J'ai demandé à Sergey et aux autres.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: It's not like you're on a tight schedule right now.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ce n'est pas comme si ton emploi du temps était chargé en ce moment.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Well...\. for the official projects,\. that is...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui bon...\. pour les projets officiels,\. en tout cas...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Really?\. You got your own pet projects again?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Vraiment ?\. Tu as encore un autre projet perso ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Alright, fine!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est bon !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Great, let's go!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Super, allons-y !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: It's really about time we both complete that part of the game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Il est grand temps que l'on termine tous les deux cette partie du jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You know that the big release will happen later today, right?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu sais que la grosse m.a.j. va sortir aujourd'hui, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: That's true. I'm sure there will be a huge crowd, though.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui. Et je suis sûr qu'il y aura plein de monde.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: What?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Quoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oh that's right, it's not really public yet, is it?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oh, c'est vrai, ce n'est pas encore officiellement public, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: For whatever reason they decided to just shadow drop it tonight.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pour une raison obscure ils ont répandu la nouvelle que sur des canaux non-officiels.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: The \c[3]final dungeon\c[0] will finally be released.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Le \c[3]donjon final\c[0] va enfin sortir.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I think they were planning to release the news just about now.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je crois qu'ils avaient prévu de l'annoncer en ce moment.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oh, someone's getting a call?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oh, quelqu'un a un appel ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: They're finally releasing it!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Il va enfin sortir !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: The\. FINAL\. DUNGEON!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Le\. DONJON\. FINAL !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: What's with that reaction?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est quoi cette réaction ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Wait, don't tell me you already knew!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Attends, me dis pas que tu le savais déjà !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: But the news just got out!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais la nouvelle vient de sortir !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You and your close developer connections.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui, oui, je sais, toi et tes relations...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Anyway!\. The whole guild is planning to run the dungeon together!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Peu importe !\. Toute la guilde prévoit de faire le donjon ensemble !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: We want to meet soon to plan the whole thing.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On veut se voir bientôt pour prévoir tout le machin.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: However, they decided to meet in the \c[3]city hall\c[0] of Homestedt this time.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Par contre, ils ont décidé de se rencontrer à l'\c[3]hôtel de ville\c[0] de \v[area.evo-village.name] cette fois.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: So...\. see you there!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Donc...\. On se voit là-bas !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Seems like your friends got the news?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On dirait que la nouvelle s'est répandue ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: We'll be going, then.\. I'd like us to be ready in time as well.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On va y aller alors.\. J'aimerais qu'on soit prêt à temps nous aussi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: See you at the dungeon!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On se voit au donjon !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Until then!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: À plus !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Meet everyone in the \c[3]City Hall\c[0] of \c[3]Homestedt\c[0] to plan running the final dungeon.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Rencontrez tout le monde à l'\c[3]Hôtel de Ville\c[0] de \c[3]\v[area.evo-village.name]\c[0] pour prévoir de courir le donjon final.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Alright then, where to start?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Donc, par où on commence ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I probably should get better equipment first.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je devrais probablement prendre du meilleur équipement en premier.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: ...\. Is... Is that gear from \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0]?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: ...\. Est... Est-ce que c'est du matos du \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0] ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Why are you only level \c[3]48\c[0]?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pourquoi tu es seulement niveau \c[3]48\c[0] ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: There was never a need to level this character any further...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je n'avais jamais eu besoin de faire monter plus haut le niveau de ce personnage...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: We've really got some work to do...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On va vraiment avoir du boulot à faire...
